Author / publisher:
- Kingdom Sim (Jaimie Montague + AI-assisted tooling)

License:
- CC0-1.0 (see LICENSE_CC0-1.0.txt)

Source / provenance:
- Original artwork generated inside this repository to unblock the WK3 asset pipeline and strict validator.

What it is:
- A minimal set of 32x32 PNG sprites (frame_000.png) for all manifest-required heroes/enemies/buildings and their required action/state folders.

Modifications:
- N/A (source is generated directly at 32x32).
